casebody.data:
Ballard v. Vehala. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fifth Department. January 11, 1889.) Action by Horatio Ballard against Michael Yehala. Judgment for plaintiff, and defendant appeals.

Argued before Barker, P. J., and Haight, Bradley, and Dwight, JJ.

Judgment affirmed. Memorandum by Dwight, J.
